text: K. V. Vijayadas (25 May 1959 â€“ 18 January 2021) was an Indian politician. He was a Member of the Kerala Legislative Assembly from the Kongad (State Assembly constituency) from 2011 until his death. He was a member of the Marxist Communist Party. Vijayadas died of a cerebral haemorrhage on 18 January 2021 in Palakkad, India at the age of 61.Kongad MLA K. V. title: K. V. Vijayadas
